ingredients: 2 cups white sugar, 1 cup shortening, 2  eggs, 4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 2 teaspoons ground nutmeg, 2 cups persimmon pulp, 2 cups raisin paste, 2 cups chopped walnuts
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Cholesterol 6mg 2%, Sodium 84mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 23g 8%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 6mg 28%, Calcium 13mg 1%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 118mg 3%
